scripts.cov: npm run cov:clean && npm run cov:generate
scripts.cov:generate: babel-node node_modules/.bin/isparta cover --report text --report html test/index.js
scripts.validate: npm run lint && npm run build && npm test
scripts.validate-dev: npm run lint && npm run build && npm test | faucet
scripts.ok: echo 'OK if the dependencies above are all devDependencies.' && echo 'Clean up any unused dependencies.'
scripts.deps: npm run missing && npm run extra && npm run ok
scripts.check: npm run audit && npm run deps && npm outdated --depth 0
